WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Download the latest source to use the new Mouse Demo in TouchlessDemo.
(No building required, just run bin\release\TouchlessDemo.exe)
The first draft of Mouse Demo is added with Change Set #28723.

Be careful, it really does control your mouse with markers!
Read the demo notes for instructions.

Thanks to all of you, particularly lepipele and eFloh for help and inspiration.
Improve the demo, suggest changes, report experiences, and post video links!

- Mike
WorkItem.Description:
Definitely.
This should also be easier to do, just hide the gui and everything and let two markers control mouse movements. Everything can be done minority style with the markers (tapes/LEDs/Nailpolish?!) on fingers of the two hands. A Click can be interpreted as the disappearance/appearance of a marker, similarly some such thing for double click and drag and drop.
Â 
You can be sitting away from your chair and playing/pausing/volume adjusting your movies while the complete time high fiving your buddies! (well not high fiving coz that could you know...)
